title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti according to package directions. 2. In a large bowl, whisk together eggs and cheese. 3. Cook pancetta until crispy. 4. Toss hot pasta with egg mixture and pancetta. 5. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Stir Fry
description: Quick and healthy stir fry with vegetables
instructions: 1. Cut chicken into strips. 2. Heat oil in wok. 3. Stir fry chicken until cooked. 4. Add vegetables and sauce. 5. Serve over rice.

title: Vegetable Soup
description: Hearty vegetable soup perfect for cold days
instructions: 1. Chop all vegetables. 2. Sauté onions and garlic. 3. Add remaining vegetables and broth. 4. Simmer for 30 minutes. 5. Season to taste.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: 1. Cream butter and sugars. 2. Add eggs and vanilla. 3. Mix in flour and chocolate chips. 4. Drop onto baking sheets. 5. Bake at 375°F for 10-12 minutes.

title: Greek Salad
description: Fresh Mediterranean salad with feta cheese
instructions: 1. Chop tomatoes, cucumbers, and onions. 2. Add olives and feta cheese. 3. Dress with olive oil and lemon juice. 4. Season with oregano and salt.
